title: Ratatouille
description: A classic ratatouille recipe starts with roasting lots of veg and finishing with fresh herbs. The end result is an authentic dish that’ll have you dreaming of being en vacance in the south of France.
ingredients: 4 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
2 red onions, cut into about 3cm cubes
3 red peppers, deseeded and cut into about 3cm cubes
15g bunch of fresh oregano, leaves roughly chopped
Large bunch of fresh flatleaf parsley, leaves roughly chopped

method.Step 1: Preheat the oven to 200°C/fan180°C/gas 6. Put the oil, garlic, tomatoes and the vegetables in a single layer in 2 roasting tins. Toss together, season and roast for 45 minutes, until tender.

method.Step 2: Mix the contents of both roasting tins together, finish with an extra drizzle of olive oil and stir in the fresh herbs.
